titulo: Mid level Fullstack React and node.js Developer
descripcion:
• Why you will love working with us?



    We offer an inspiring and rewarding environment, where we encourage you to be the best version of yourself. Our leadership team is committed to your professional growth, as well as to constant innovation and improvement.



    Reasons to join our Team:



    • We thrive to reach out to tomorrow. We inspire and transform the way business is done.

    • We are world class colleagues who work together across cultures and disciplines.

    • Leadership commitment towards Ksquarians, transparency, growth, learning and thrilling challenges.

    • Your work matters and has a direct impact of our organizational success – you can feel and see it every day.

    • We offer you trust, flexibility and welfare, because you are important to us

    Your Role



    Duties & Responsibilities:



    Work directly with technologies like Javascript or Typescript, HTML and CSS using React as your main front end library for the implementation of reusable components and Single Page Applications depending on the project or team assigned.



    As a node.js developer, you will be working directly with JavaScript or TypeScript using node.js and libraries like Express or HappiJS to implement web services and other types of applications depending on the project and team assigned.



    Your main responsibilities will consist of development of server-side logic, defining and maintaining databases and ensuring high performance and responsiveness of the web services.



    Areas of Focus



    3. RESTful Web Services design and development



    2. SQL and/or NoSQL database programming



    3. Implementing server-side logic



    Areas of Focus



    1. Frontend Development with JavaScript, CSS and HTML

    2. Developing Single Page applications using React

    3. Work with a Team using Agile methodologies

    4. Share technical insight with the team for reaching the best solution for the problem at hand

    5. Be open to learn and work with other technologies like Node.js



    Qualifications:

    • University degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering or similar

    • 2 years of experience in front end and backend development

    • 2 years of experience with React

    • 2 years of experience with Node.js



    Requested Basic Competencies:

    • Proficiency in technical English

    • Good communication with clients and team members

    • Customer orientation

    • Eager to learn new things and contribute to the growth of the organization and colleagues



    Required Technical Competencies:

    • Strong understanding on Web APIs and internals (Localstorage, Webworkers, DOM, etc.)

    • Strong comprehension of core Javascript concepts

    • Creation of highly reusable components

    • Strong knowledge of CSS and it’s quirks in different environments

    • Understanding of RESTful web services

    • Interfacing SQL and noSQL databases

    • Building reusable software modules and libraries

    • Using tools like mocha and chai (or equivalent) for unit testing

    • Use of modern JavaScript or TypeScript

    • Use best practices for cybersecurity

    • Use of tools for performance measurement and optimization

    • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements



    Nice to Have:

    • Experience with Restful APIs consumption and creation (Node.js)

    • Container creation (docker) and CI / CD integrations

    • Understanding of performance optimizations for custom animations

    • Knowledge of Redux or similar state-management technologies

    • Have created multiple front end or architectures just for fun

    • Experience with Typescript

    • Experience with unit testing, and e2e testing

    You can apply from anywhere in the Dominican Republic and work from home.
